opinion.opinion_text:
Since this appeal involves a suit in equity for the cancellation of a promissory note, as well as for damages, it appears that the matter falls within the jurisdiction of the Supreme Court and the appeal is accordingly transferred to that court.
Transferred to the Supreme Court. Felton, C. J., and Whitman, J., concur.Page 610
ARGUED APRIL 1, 1968 â€” DECIDED APRIL 4, 1968.
opinion.posture: Cancellation. Fulton Superior Court. Before Judge Holt.
opinion.attorneys:
Preston L. Holland, for appellant.
Huie Harland, Terrill A. Parker, Harry L. Cashin, for appellee.
